metadata.title: CVE-2023-40549 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in Shim due to the lack of properboundary verification during the load of a PE binary. This flaw allows anattacker to load a crafted PE binary, triggering the issue and crashingShim, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: shim-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
shim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
